name: dom-node-template
description: create usefull html or svg element wrapper object with es6 template string.

scripts.build:es5: npm run babelrc:es5 && npm run transpile
scripts.build:es6: npm run babelrc:es6 && npm run transpile
scripts.build:all: npm run build:webpack && npm run build:es6
scripts.test: npm run build:es5 && mocha --require babel-core/register --require jsdom-global/register --
scripts.test:inspect: npm run builds:es5 && mocha --require babel-core/register --require jsdom-global/register --inspect-brk --watch --
scripts.test:all: npm run build:es5 && mocha --require babel-core/register --require jsdom-global/register
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test:all && npm run build:all

author: Dennis Weiersh√§user <dennis.weiershaeuser@informatik.hs-fulda.de>
